comments:
I was copying and pasting code in the Java editor in the Java perspective and I started getting inexplicable NPE's from Debug.

This may be a Platform/UI issue with command handlers.

eclipse.buildId=I20060321-1210
java.version=1.5.0_03
java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc.
BootLoader constants: OS=win32, ARCH=x86, WS=win32, NL=en_US
Command-line arguments:  -os win32 -ws win32 -arch x86

Error
2006-03-27 02:23:01.77
java.lang.NullPointerException
